cpl.readme:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">

钓鱼插件使用 [[FSRS 自由间隔重复调度|https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/454932406]]算法，将[[渐进学习|https://www.yuque.com/supermemo/wiki/incremental_learning]]集成在 TiddlyWiki 中，终身知识，深入脑海。

渐进学习主要使用''抽认卡''。抽认卡的背后有两个简单原理：[[间隔重复|https://supermemo.guru/wiki/Spaced_repetition]]和[[主动回忆|https://supermemo.guru/wiki/Active_recall]]。绝大多数人都经历过很多次“复习和考试”，但很少意识到其中运用了这两个原理。

钓鱼插件把''笔记条目''作为抽认卡，进行渐进学习。既然在 TiddlyWiki 中 ''Tiddler''（笔记条目）的形象说法是故事河中的小鱼，那么就把将其勾入脑海中的插件叫做钓鱼。

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

Fishing plugin integrates [[Incremental Learning|https://help.supermemo.org/wiki/Incremental_learning]] into TiddlyWiki, using [[FSRS|https://github.com/open-spaced-repetition/free-spaced-repetition-scheduler]] algorithm, deepening lifelong knowledge into the Sea of Mind.

Incremental learning mainly uses ''Flashcards''. There are two simple principles behind Flashcards: [[Spaced Repetition|https://supermemo.guru/wiki/Spaced_repetition]] and [[Active Recall|https://supermemo.guru/wiki/Active_recall]]. The vast majority of people have been through many 'reviews and exams', but rarely realize that these two principles are used.

Fishing plugin uses ''tiddler note'' as Flashcards for incremental learning. Since Tiddler means small fish in the Story River of TiddlyWiki, this plugin that hooks Tiddler into the Sea of Brain is called Fishing.

</$list>
</$list>
